name: Panpour
flavorText:
The water stored inside the tuft on
its head is full of nutrients. Plants
that receive its water grow large.

previous.name: Simisear
previous.flavorText:
It loves sweets because they become
energy for the fire burning inside
its body.

next.name: Simipour
next.flavorText:
The tuft on its head holds water. When
the level runs low, it replenishes the
tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.
